alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 7:10PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Webster and east central Bossier Parishes through 745 PM CDT... At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cotton Valley, or 14 miles northwest of Minden, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cotton Valley, Ivan, Rocky Mount and Couchwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
